original_text: Then Jesus returned again to Peter, James and John. He saw that they were sleeping. They could not keep their eyes open.
korean_text: 다시 오사 보신즉 그들이 자니 이는 그들의 눈이 피곤함일러라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus returned again to Peter, James and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 다시 베드로와 야고보와 요한에게 돌아오셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He saw that they were sleeping
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 자고 있는 것을 보셨습니다

sentences.original_text: They could not keep their eyes open
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 눈을 뜨고 있을 수 없었습니다
